title: Node.js API Development
description: Build REST APIs using Node.js and Express. Learn routing, middleware, authentication, and connecting to databases. Explore real-world projects, error handling, and best practices for creating scalable and maintainable backend applications. Gain hands-on experience with Postman, JWT, and environment configuration for production-ready APIs.

title: React Frontend Development
description: Learn how to build interactive user interfaces using React. Master components, JSX, state management, hooks, routing, and API integration. Work on modern web development practices like responsive design, performance optimization, and code splitting. Create beautiful, dynamic, and maintainable frontends suitable for real-world applications.

title: Fullstack Web Development
description: Combine frontend and backend skills to build complete web applications using the MERN stack. Learn MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js integration, authentication, and deployment strategies. Develop hands-on projects to understand the flow of data between client and server, API design, and modern fullstack architecture. Prepare for real-world web development tasks with practical examples.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Design beautiful and user-friendly interfaces using Figma, Adobe XD, and design principles. Understand user research, wireframing, prototyping, typography, color theory, and accessibility. Learn to create designs that delight users and enhance user experience. Apply industry-standard techniques to build professional portfolios and hands-on UI/UX projects.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Analyze data, create models, and gain actionable insights using Python, Pandas, NumPy, and machine learning libraries. Learn data cleaning, visualization, statistical analysis, and building predictive models. Gain experience working on real datasets, understanding trends, and generating reports. Apply machine learning techniques and best practices to solve business problems and scientific challenges.

title: Digital Marketing
description: Master SEO, social media, content marketing, and advertising strategies to grow businesses online. Learn how to plan campaigns, optimize content, analyze performance, and increase engagement. Understand analytics, email marketing, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads to create results-driven campaigns. Build a strong digital marketing skillset applicable to startups, agencies, and personal brands.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Learn the fundamentals of cloud computing using Amazon Web Services (AWS). Understand cloud architecture, EC2 instances, S3 storage, Lambda functions, and serverless deployment. Gain hands-on experience managing cloud resources, setting up networking, and implementing security best practices. Prepare for real-world cloud projects and AWS certifications.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Learn UI design, state management, API integration, and deploying apps to iOS and Android. Work on real-world projects to create fast, responsive, and visually appealing mobile applications. Understand best practices for performance optimization and app architecture.
